title: bhootanAtha
sahitya:
bhUtanAtha mAm pAhi parAtpara bhUri bhUtikara puNya nadIshvara

anupallavi

 vIta rAga bhava bhaya mada matsara vishvarUpa vinatAvana tatpara

caraNam

 nIradAbha niravadya nirantara sUrashObha suranAtha dayAkara 
ghOra rUpayuta mahiSI madahara shAradEndu mukha shAntAkAra

madhyama kAlam

mOhinI shiva kumAra shivamkara mOha nAshaka viSENa guNAkara 
mOhinI sharadarOpama sundara mOhanAnga vana tulasIhAra
